description: Actors, directors, writers, and crew members

columns.birthYear: Birth year (4-digit integer, can be NULL)
columns.deathYear: Death year if deceased (NULL if alive)
columns.knownForTitles: Comma-separated tconst values of notable works

data_quality_notes: birthYear and deathYear can be NULL
knownForTitles is comma-separated, use LIKE '%tt1234567%' to check
primaryName may have duplicates (different people, same name)
